creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Temple hanging, framed, of satin applique on satin.  The design represents Buddha seated on lotus in a field of floral sprays and clouds.  The colors, tan, brown, and blue have taken on a prevailing dark rather rusty tone.  The Buddha is shown in the gesture of calling the earth to witness.
title: Temple Hanging
